description:
Waka poems were a popular art form in the Heian period, enough that the famous poet Fujiwara no Sadaie and Emperor Go-Toba sought to put together a selected collection of chosen verses.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Hundred Cats Chosen for the Hyakumeow Isshu!
Hyaku Nyan Erande, Hyaku Nyan Isshu!
百猫[にゃん]えらんで. 百猫[にゃん]一首!
